title: Multimodal AI for COPD Progression
authors: M. Pozza, V. Sakkalis, et al.
abstract: We propose a deep learning framework that integrates imaging and clinical time series to forecast COPD trajectories and support personalized interventions.

title: Interpretable Transformers for Clinical Time Series
authors: M. Pozza, A. Rossi, et al.
abstract: An interpretable transformer architecture for irregularly-sampled clinical time series with attention mechanisms aligned to clinician insight.

title: Bias Auditing in Multimodal Healthcare Models
authors: M. Pozza, L. Bianchi, et al.
abstract: A systematic evaluation protocol to assess and mitigate demographic bias in multimodal diagnostic models.
